meanings.definition: A synthetic dye used in the textile industry.
meanings.sent1: The induline added a vibrant hue to the fabric.
meanings.sent2: The textile factory used induline to color their products.
meanings.sent3: The induline decided to dye everything in sight, including the walls!
meanings.sent4: Her love for induline was as deep as the color it produced.
meanings.sent5: The induline dye transformed the plain cloth into a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: To treat with excessive leniency or generosity.
meanings.sent1: She would often induline her pet with extra treats.
meanings.sent2: The teacher decided to induline the students with extra recess time.
meanings.sent3: He would induline his plants by watering them twice a day.
meanings.sent4: The coach would induline the star player with special training sessions.
meanings.sent5: The chef would induline the customers with complimentary desserts.

meanings.definition: A dark blue or black color.
meanings.sent1: The night sky had a deep induline hue.
meanings.sent2: She painted her room in a calming induline shade.
meanings.sent3: The induline of the stormy sea matched his mood perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The induline of her hair was as dark as a moonless night.
meanings.sent5: The artist mixed blue and black to create a beautiful induline color.
